snippet: Page 1, a new movie and television company, will aim for productions based on nonmanufactured events with a visceral impact.
abstract: Screenwriter Mark Boal has teamed up with film financier Megan Ellison and former New York Times Magazine editor Hugo Lindgren to form Page 1, company committed to producing movies and television shows based on current events.
lead_paragraph: Page 1, a new movie and television company, will aim for productions based on nonmanufactured events with a visceral impact.

headline.main: New Venture Envisions Films Based on Gritty Journalism
headline.print_headline: New Venture Envisions Films Based on Gritty Journalism
